wikitext.*:
'''Captain of Ships''' was a title of [[Gondor]] that was held by [[Castamir]], the grandson of [[Calimehtar (son of Calmacil)|Calimehtar]], the younger brother of king [[Rómendacil II]].<ref name="Eldacar">{{App|Gondor}}, entry for king Eldacar, p. 1047</ref>

Castamir was the Captain of Ships during the [[Kin-strife]]. His position allowed him to find supporters from  the havens of [[Umbar]], [[Pelargir]] and the coastal lands of Gondor, and to overthrow the rightful King [[Eldacar]].<ref name="Eldacar"/>

==See also==
* [[Captain of the King's Ships]], a title in [[Númenor]] that was also called Captain of Ships.
